name: Premium Minigolf
description:
Premium Minigolf is the best, and also FREE, mobile minigolf out there. Smooth touch screen controls, stunning graphics and real life sound effects continues to offer the same quality than other Premium titles.

Play through over 100 challenging levels. Earn stars and unlock new courses. If this is not enough, new content updates will constantly bring more content and features to enjoy.

Game features:
- Over 100 levels
- Rating system
- Smooth mobile friendly Premium controls
- Stunning graphics
- Realistic sound effects
